meanings.definition: A plant of the nightshade family, especially those of the genus Solanum.
meanings.sent1: The solanums in the garden have purple flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted solanums in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The solanums whispered secrets to the moon at night.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of solanums, each thought a vibrant bloom.
meanings.sent5: The solanums swayed gently in the breeze, a silent dance of nature.

meanings.definition: The fruit of a plant of the nightshade family, especially a tomato or potato.
meanings.sent1: She harvested ripe solanums from the vine.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store sells fresh solanums all year round.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a solanum and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were filled with solanums, each one a different flavor.
meanings.sent5: The solanums gleamed like jewels in the sunlight, tempting all who passed by.
